Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Partita no. 6 in E minor, BWV 830

published 1730

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 32'

  • 1. Toccata
  • 2. Allemanda
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Air
  • 5. Sarabande
  • 6. Tempo di Gavotta
  • 7. Gigue

This partita also exists in an earlier version (BWV3 830.1) in the 1725 Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 1 · BA 5046-01 · Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 4 · BA 5008-01 · Die Klavierbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach von 1722 und 1725 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen [version from the 1725 Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach]
  • Associated Board · Partitas Nos. IV–VI · ed. Walter Emery
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5152 · Sechs Partiten / Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5247 · Sechs Partiten / Erster Teil der Klavierübung · ed. Richard Jones
  • Henle · HN 518 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 519 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 1518 · Sechs Partiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Peters · EP 11500 · Die Clavier-Büchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach / 1722 & 1725 · ed. Christoph Wolff [version from the 1725 Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50192 · 6 Partiten · ed. Klaus Engler

1. Toccata

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Allemanda

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Courante

A version of this movement, for solo keyboard and with only slight changes, was used in the first version of the sonata no. 6 in G major for violin and harpsichord (BWV1,2,2a 1019a/3; BWV3 1019.1/3).

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3.5

4. Air

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

5. Sarabande

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

6. Tempo di Gavotta

A version of this movement, for violin with an accompanying bass, was used in the first version of the sonata no. 6 in G major for violin and harpsichord (BWV1,2,2a 1019a/5; BWV3 1019.1/5). The bass lines match with some changes, but the violin part is lost.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

7. Gigue

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 3.5
